subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Beyond his 7-foot-3-inch frame and his ability to hit 3-pointers, beyond his spin moves and his putback dunks, Porzingis has impressed teammates with his commitment.
snippet: Beyond his 7-foot-3-inch frame and his ability to hit 3-pointers, beyond his spin moves and his putback dunks, Porzingis has impressed teammates with his commitment.
